mapper.insert: insert into market_info (id, open_value, end_value, rise_fall, rise_fall_ratio, highest, lowest, date,pre_end_value,total_amount) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{endValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{riseFall,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{riseFallRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highest,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lowest,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{preEndValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{totalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

insert into market_info
id,
open_value,
end_value,
rise_fall,
rise_fall_ratio,
highest,
lowest,
date,
total_amount,
pre_end_value,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{openValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{endValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{riseFall,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{riseFallRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{highest,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{lowest,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{totalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{preEndValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

replace into market_info (open_value, end_value, rise_fall, rise_fall_ratio, highest, lowest, date,share_code,total_amount,pre_end_value) VALUES
(#{it.openValue},#{it.endValue},#{it.riseFall}, #{it.riseFallRatio},#{it.highest},#{it.lowest}, #{it.date},#{it.shareCode},#{it.totalAmount},#{it.preEndValue})
mapper.select: select max(date) as date from market_info t where t.share_code =#{shareCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT share_code as shareCode, date, sumCount as dealAmount, secondAmount FROM ( select *, case when countUp=2 and rise_fall_ratio>0 then sumCount end as secondAmount from ( SELECT share_code, rise_fall_ratio, FIRST_value(rise_fall_ratio)over(PARTITION by share_code order by date ) as firstRatio, date, row_number () over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date DESC ) AS rowhi, COUNT( CASE WHEN rise_fall_ratio > 0 THEN 1 END ) OVER ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 4 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) AS countUp, sum(rise_fall_ratio) over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ) AS sumCount, turn_over_rate, FIRST_value(deal_amount)over(PARTITION by share_code order by date ) as firstDealAmount, FIRST_value(turn_over_rate)over(PARTITION by share_code order by date ) as firstTurnOverRate FROM market_info_new WHERE date >= #{upStartTime} AND date <#{upEndTime} ) as nini order by share_code,date ) AS mimi WHERE sumCount>0 and sumCount<20 and rise_fall_ratio> 0 and turn_over_rate> #{minTurnOverRate} and firstRatio >0 and firstDealAmount/firstTurnOverRate >#{minMarketValue} and (countUp = #{minUpDay} OR secondAmount>0) order by share_code

select share_code as shareCode, turn_over_rate as turnOverRate, rise_fall_ratio as rate from market_info_new kk where kk.share_code in (SELECT share_code FROM market_info_new WHERE share_code IN ( SELECT share_code FROM market_info_new WHERE date >= #{upStartTime} AND date <= #{upEndTime} AND rise_fall_ratio > 0 GROUP BY share_code HAVING SUM(rise_fall_ratio) >= #{minRate} AND COUNT(share_code) = #{minUpDay} ) AND date >= #{downStartTime} AND date < #{downEndTime} AND rise_fall_ratio < 0 GROUP BY share_code HAVING COUNT(share_code) > 7) and date = #{upEndTime} and turn_over_rate >= #{minTurnOverRate} and deal_amount/turn_over_rate > #{minMarketValue}

SELECT share_code as shareCode, date as startTime FROM ( SELECT *, row_number () over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ) AS rowhw FROM ( SELECT share_code, rise_fall_ratio, COUNT( CASE WHEN rise_fall_ratio > 0 THEN 1 END ) OVER ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN #{periodUpDay} PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) AS countUp, sum(rise_fall_ratio) over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ) AS sumCount, first_value (deal_amount / turn_over_rate) over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date DESC ) AS shizhi, first_value (turn_over_rate) over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date DESC ) AS turnOverRate, nth_value (rise_fall_ratio, 4) over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ) AS fourThRatio, first_value (rise_fall_ratio) over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date DESC ) AS lastRatio, row_number () over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ) AS rowhi, date FROM market_info_new tt WHERE tt.date >= #{upStartTime} AND tt.date <= #{upEndTime} ) fined WHERE share_code IN ( SELECT share_code FROM ( SELECT share_code, rise_fall_ratio, COUNT( CASE WHEN rise_fall_ratio > 0 THEN 1 END ) OVER ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN #{periodDownDay} PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) AS countUp, sum(rise_fall_ratio) over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ) AS sumCount, first_value (deal_amount / turn_over_rate) over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ) AS shizhi, first_value (turn_over_rate) over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ) AS turnOverRate, row_number () over ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ) AS rowhi, date FROM market_info_new tt WHERE tt.date >= #{downStartTime} AND tt.date <= #{downEndTime} ) kk WHERE kk.rowhi = #{periodDownDay}+1 AND kk.sumCount <- 4 AND kk.turnOverRate > #{minTurnOverRate} AND countUp <= 2 AND shizhi > #{minMarketValue} ) AND countUp >= #{minUpDay} AND turnOverRate > #{minTurnOverRate} AND sumCount > 4 ) ll WHERE ll.rowhw = 1 AND ( CASE WHEN ll.rowhi = #{periodUpDay} +1 AND fourThRatio < 0 THEN ABS(lastRatio) > ABS(fourThRatio) ELSE 1 = 1 END )

select SUBSTR(tt.share_code,4)as shareCode, sinf.share_name as shareName, sumRatio,sinf.type as type from ( SELECT share_code,share_name, sum(rise_fall_ratio) as sumRatio FROM market_info_new WHERE date >= (select date from trade_date where id = (select id from trade_date where date = #{condition.startDate})-#{condition.serialDownCount}) AND date <= #{condition.startDate} and deal_amount > 8000000 AND SUBSTR(share_code, 4) IN ( SELECT share_code FROM share_info WHERE hushen_status = 'B' ) GROUP BY share_code HAVING count(case when rise_fall_ratio<0 then 1 end)=#{condition.serialDownCount}+1 ) tt ,share_info sinf where SUBSTR(tt.share_code,4) = sinf.share_code and tt.sumRatio< #{condition.fixDownRatio} ORDER BY sinf.type

select SUBSTR(tt.share_code,4)as shareCode, sinf.share_name as shareName, sumRatio,sinf.type as type from ( SELECT share_code,share_name, sum(rise_fall_ratio) as sumRatio FROM market_info_new WHERE date >= (select date from trade_date where id = (select id from trade_date where date = #{condition.startDate})-#{condition.serialDownCount}) AND date <= #{condition.startDate} and deal_amount > 8000000 AND SUBSTR(share_code, 4) IN ( SELECT share_code FROM share_info WHERE hushen_status = 'B' ) GROUP BY share_code HAVING count(case when rise_fall_ratio<0 then 1 end)=#{condition.serialDownCount}+1 ) tt ,share_info sinf where SUBSTR(tt.share_code,4) = sinf.share_code and tt.sumRatio< 0 ORDER BY sinf.type

select SUBSTR(mm.share_code,4)as shareCode,ll.share_name as shareName,ll.type as type,sumRatio from ( select share_code, sumRatio from (SELECT *, round(end_value / (1 + rise_fall_ratio * 0.01),4) AS lastEndValue, COUNT( CASE WHEN round(end_value / (1 + rise_fall_ratio * 0.01),4) > highest THEN 1 END ) OVER ( PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) AS countUp, SUM(rise_fall_ratio) over (PARTITION by share_code ORDER BY date) as sumRatio from market_info_new tt WHERE date <= #{param1.startDate} AND date > (select date from trade_date tt where tt.id = (select id from trade_date where date = #{param1.startDate})-2) and round(end_value / (1 + rise_fall_ratio * 0.01),2)>highest) kk where kk.countUp = 2 and kk.deal_amount > 8000000 and SUBSTR(share_code,4) in (select share_code from share_info where hushen_status = 'B') ) mm,(select share_code,share_name,type from share_info where hushen_status = 'B') ll where mm.share_code = CONCAT('cn_',ll.share_code) and mm.sumRatio <= -0.4

select DISTINCT ll.share_code as shareCode, first_value(sumFinRatio)over(PARTITION by kk.share_code ORDER BY sumFinRatio ) as sumratio, first_value(countUp)over(PARTITION by kk.share_code ORDER BY countUp desc) as countday, ll.share_name as shareName, ll.type as type from ( SELECT share_code, final_ratio, start_time, deal_amount, row_number()over(partition by share_code order by start_time desc) as rownum, COUNT(CASE WHEN max_ratio<0 THEN 1 END ) OVER (PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY start_time desc ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) AS countUp, SUM(min_ratio)over(PARTITION by share_code order by start_time desc) as sumMinRatio, SUM(final_ratio)over(PARTITION by share_code order by start_time desc) as sumFinRatio FROM serial_temp WHERE start_time <= #{condition.startDate} AND start_time > (select date from trade_date tt where tt.id = (select id from trade_date where date = #{condition.startDate})-6) ) kk,(select share_code,share_name,type from share_info where hushen_status = 'B') ll where kk.rownum = kk.countUp and countUp>=#{condition.minDownRiver} and sumMinRatio<#{condition.minSumRatio} and deal_amount >8000000 and kk.share_code = CONCAT('cn_',ll.share_code)

select SUBSTR(hihi.share_code,4)as shareCode, sinf.share_name as shareName, SUM(rise_fall_ratio) as sumRatio,sinf.type as type, COUNT(hihi.share_code) as countDay from (select share_code, rise_fall_ratio, date, rowhi, row_number() over (PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date desc) as xoRownum from (SELECT share_code, rise_fall_ratio, date, deal_amount, row_number () over (PARTITION BY share_code ORDER BY date desc) AS rowhi FROM market_info_new WHERE date >= (select date from trade_date where id = (select id from trade_date where date = #{condition.startDate})-#{condition.maxSerialCount}) AND date <= #{condition.startDate} AND SUBSTR(share_code, 4) IN ( SELECT share_code FROM share_info WHERE hushen_status = 'B' ) )tt where tt.rise_fall_ratio <0 and deal_amount > 8000000) hihi,share_info sinf where hihi.rowhi = hihi.xoRownum and SUBSTR(hihi.share_code,4) = sinf.share_code GROUP BY hihi.share_code having count(hihi.share_code)>=#{condition.minSerialCount} and sum(rise_fall_ratio)< #{condition.fixDownRatio} ORDER BY sinf.type;
